title: What's the postcode of where you worked or work?
h1: What’s the postcode where you worked or work?
p1: We need this to help progress your claim. If you work or worked at home occasionally or full time, enter the postcode where you would go to work for the employer.
p2: If you’re claiming against someone you’ve not worked for - as best as you can, enter the postcode of where they’re based.
